name: Yaksha's Mask
description:
ATK +2. Physical DMG dealt is converted to Anemo DMG.
Actions +1, apply 1 stack of Actions gain less Energy.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: ATK +2. $[K100] dealt is converted to $[K105].\nActions +1, apply 1 stack of $[C147].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
